summary: This bill, the High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2025, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for depreciation purposes. It defines 'automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property' and sets criteria based on the National Fire Protection Association standards, residential property use, and building height. The act aims to incentivize the installation of fire sprinkler systems in high-rise buildings.
